name: Rank-Up-Magic Raptor's Force
effectText: If a "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster was destroyed and sent to the GY this turn while you controlled it: Target 1 "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster in your GY; Special Summon it, then Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "Raidraptor" monster that is 1 Rank higher than that monster, by using it as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.)
